product_desc:
Young Mind Interactive, is a developer and publisher of educational games, eBooks and digital learning tools. We create engaging, effective teaching applications to enhance the learning experience in the classroom and home learning environment. Our products are designed for use in today’s classrooms on mobile devices, laptops, desktops and projected interactive screens, providing a hands-on learning experience while enhancing the learning experience at school and beyond.

Our goal is to provide students and educators with the newest teaching tools for the modern classroom. To do so, we consult educators and education experts throughout the development process in order to produce games that are effective at providing a working knowledge and understanding of the topics covered. We are continuously exploring subjects and developing new apps to engage students of all ages, and we also provide customized apps to address specific topics and curricula for clients in Education.
name: Young Mind Interactive
